tweet.text: There's also the England job latest, reaction to Amir Khan's world title rematch & an interview with Milan Mandaric on his future in England
tweet.name: Sky Sports News

tweet.text: A huge week for football so far - now it's time for the games! We're previewing tomorrow's 8 Prem games, including Man Utd v Liverpool #SSN
tweet.name: Sky Sports News

tweet.text: Amir Khan's rematch with Lamont Peterson arranged for May 19 in Las Vegas. Reaction on SSN Through the Night.
tweet.name: Sky Sports News

tweet.text: Amir Khan is live in the studio very shortly on SSN.

tweet.text: Ryan Jones replaces suspended Bradley Davies at lock for Wales against Scotland in Six Nations on Sunday. #SSN

tweet.text: Former World Welterweight champion Ricky Hatton joins us live in the studio just after 4.15pm - don't miss it. #SSN

tweet.text: Coming up shortly Stevo joins us for a look back at the opening weekend of Super League XVII & a look ahead to the second round of games

tweet.text: FA say next manager does not have to be English but would be "preferable". All the details from FA news conference coming up. #SSN

tweet.text: Stuart Pearce takes temporary charge of England for Netherlands game. FA begin drawing up shortlist of candidates for new manager tomorrow
